attributes.action: Stop the discrimination against grey squirrels. .
attributes.additional_details: https://nedhardy.com/2020/02/10/squirrels-plant-trees/amp/ here is the link about trees been grown when grey squirrels forget where food is buried squirrels also bring joy in peoples gardens.  I think it's cruel to poison and shoot them
attributes.background: Grey squirrells should be protected by the government.its about time they were  recognised as Part of our British wildlife. Since been introduced in the the UK by the Victorians

rejection.details: We can see that you want the Government to take action to protect grey squirrels, but it's not clear how you would like the Government to do this. You might like to start a new petition asking for a specific way in which the Government can better protect grey squirrels.
